text:
I am smoke— Or perhaps, I am the wind.
Born from a smokeless fire, a hot wind racing across the desert in search of a master.

The desert otherworld, Garodemann.
The 'mechanism' that governs that realm is the dualism of 'Light' and 'Dark'.

A world supported by a prototype 'mechanism' that splits everything into two opposing sides.
The 'Spirit' is the existence that expresses this system in its simplest form.

They like high places, they like things to be clearly defined as 'above' or 'below'.
Therefore, genies are well-suited to being 'teachers or subordinates'.

Mischievous and dangerous ones, ones granting inspiration to priestesses and poets...
They have been divided into upper and lower genies based on their nature.

Among them, of the highest class, the most fallen genie,
is given a special name that resonates across countless worlds.

name: Jinn
text:
The infamy that thunders even outside Garodemann— Shaitan.
A name bestowed upon the 'Spirit', who has
mastered the extremes of this world's hierarchies.

name: Jinn
text:
Come to think of it― That student's face somewhat resembles 'Ahriman',
the one supposed to be destroyed at the Final Judgment...

A stall belonging to a shopkeeper from Garodemann,
lined with kebabs and juices squeezed from rumman.

Normally, he'd think to hit up an izakaya for some Tokyo sake—
But Jinn, feeling a pang of nostalgia for his homeland, had settled himself here.

He pops morsels of meze into his mouth between sips of arak.
It's a nostalgic taste, quite different from an evening drink in Tokyo.

vocabulary time

kebab: grilled meat skewers, originating from Middle East
rumman (رمان): Arabic for pomegranates :D
izakaya (居酒屋): informal bar, I'm sure you'd at least seen one, even if you didn't know the term
meze: small dishes, served as appetizers in Eastern Mediterranean
arak (عرق): distilled spirit (liquor) often served with meze

It was in the middle of this relaxed, post-work moment
that his storm of a student came crashing in.

name: Jinn
text:
Oh, [Player], you made it!
But this place serves alcohol. High schoolers are...

name: Jinn
text:
Well... As long as you don't order any, I guess it's fine...
It's a festival, and it's not like that microphone is here with us, right?

options.text: So this is where you were.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I just started missing Garodemann.
'Nostalgia' isn't really my style, but it just happened today.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I just started missing Garodemann.
'Nostalgia' isn't really my style, but it just happened today.

options.text: Is this water? Can I drink some?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey! You can sit down, but hands off that drink!
You're on exchange to the Police Academy, so act like it!

name: Jinn
text:
Anyway, what's up?
You came all the way to a liquor stall...

name: Jinn
text:
You're at the middle of Kiou right now.
If you're going to walk around the festival, wouldn't it be better
with your friends or teachers at your transfer school?

name: Jinn
text:
This is a chance to expand your potential and your options, you know?
Your teach's just gonna relax here, so go have fun!

options.text: I'd rather be with you, teach!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You... are only acting spoiled at times like this...!?
What happened to your usual reckless self!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But for me, a teacher, to walk the festival with a student on exchange...
Ugh, how troubling...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Then again, it'd be uncool for a teacher to turn down his student's invitation...
Hmmmm...

options.text: But you're happy I asked, aren't you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ugh...! Stop teasing me!
D-Don't look at me!
A teacher has a 'reputation' to uphold...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
For some reason, I'm really weak to that side of you.
You keep smashing through the teacher-student dualism with that look on your face...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ugh...! Stop teasing me!
D-Don't look at me!
A teacher has a 'reputation' to uphold...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
For some reason, I'm really weak to that side of you.
You keep smashing through the teacher-student dualism with that look on your face...!

text:
Jinn drains the arak he was holding.
Slamming the cup down with force, it seemed he had made up his mind.

name: Jinn
text:
Daaaah! Worrying like this isn't like me at all...
A wish, a wish...! If this is your 'first wish', then fine!!

name: Jinn
text:
As a teacher, I'd feel hesitant...!
So— As a Genie of Smoke, I shall grant your wish!

name: Jinn
text:
Shopkeeper, the check, please!
That arak was great, haven't had it in ages!

After paying, Jinn stands up from
the stall's bench and turns to [Player].

With a puff of his breath, Jinn's appearance changes
in an instant to a more winter-appropriate outfit.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey! Mind your TPO!
You didn't actually drink anything, did you...?

name: Jinn
text:
If we're doing this, we might as well go all out.
Here, [Player]—

It is the ancient, traditional vow of the genie from his homeland.
Words sent only to the master who rubbed the lamp.

name: Jinn
text:
I, the Genie of Smoke shall grant your wish, and show you to the end.
Let us spend this Tokyo 'Chaharshanbe Suri' together.

Chaharshanbe Suri: ancient Iranian fire festival,
celebrated in the night on the last Wednesday of the year

A calm, deep voice never heard at school.
The resonance of a servant, tinged with the desire to serve someone, is present.

But then, Jinn grins and pulls [Player] up,
almost lifting them as he stands.

name: Jinn
text:
Just kidding. You're still too green to be my official master!
But since you've invited me, let's make sure we enjoy ourselves.

With that, the two walk out into the festival bustle.
Somehow, Jinn's steps seemed lighter than usual.

options.text: This genie is way too easy to deal with...!
This is starting to make me worried.

name: Jinn
text:
[Player], did you say something?
...Well, whatever. Come here, so you don't get lost in the crowd.

name: Jinn
text:
You seem like the type to wander off so easily.
I really can't take my eyes off you, because you keep me on edge.

name: Jinn
text:
Al... Alright, let's go!
The festival is waiting for us!

Even though the main event had ended, the lines at the stalls were still thriving.
The two walk side-by-side through the lively street of vendors.

name: Jinn
text:
I bought some takoyaki!
Fuu... Fuu... Here, open your mouth. Say 'aaah'!

name: Jinn
text:
Be careful not to burn yourself, okay?
How is it? Good? I thought so!

name: Jinn
text:
And also, you can't have a festival without eating yakisoba.
See, it's got plenty of sauce, looks delicious, right?

name: Jinn
text:
...Wait, haha, you've got some sauce on you.
Hold still, I'll wipe it off.

Jinn's hot, dry thumb wipes [Player]'s lip.
Licking the sauce off his own finger, Jinn gives a mischievous laugh.

name: Jinn
text:
Want to take a break? There's an empty bench.
Wait a sec. Let me brush off the snow... Lay down a handkerchief...

name: Jinn
text:
Don't look at the handkerchief like it's a surprise!
I've been carrying one ever since Kyoma-sensei told me to!

While receiving Jinn's cheerful care as they toured the stalls,
the two take a breather on the outskirts of the festival.

options.text: I-I was planning to be the one to lead...!
Isn't your nature as a 'spirit' leaking out a bit too much!?
You're treating me way too much like a kid!

name: Jinn
text:
Gwahahaha, my bad!
You're almost an adult, and yet I just can't help wanting to look after you!

name: Jinn
text:
Still, even for a 'spirit',
I'm finding myself desperately wanting to serve you.

name: Jinn
text:
I didn't intend for this...
Maybe 'that bite mark' is still there?

Tilting his muscular neck, Jinn rubs the spot where the mark had been.
Of course, nothing remained there.

In that case—
The remaining possibilities were limited.

name: Jinn
text:
I am searching for a master. My instinct as a 'spirit'
is demanding that I devote myself to someone.

name: Jinn
text:
Being needed by 'students' and being needed by a
single 'master' may seem similar, but they're different...

name: Jinn
text:
...Dammit, the 'Evil God' keeps flickering in my mind...
You're just supposed to be my student...!

name: Jinn
text:
And... Being with you just throws me off my game.
We're just teacher and student, yet it feels
like there's some fate tying us from a past life...

Suddenly, [Player] radiates the presence of 'The Supreme Genie'.
But— At the same time, Jinn felt the premonition of a vessel worthy of leading him.

Two opposing possibilities, existing together in contradiction.
That is what makes Jinn so troubled.

A 'bad kid' can become a 'good kid'.
Having seen that, he is drawn into that contradiction.

Before he knew it, Jinn's hand had moved on its own.
In his palm was a hand much smaller than his own.

name: Jinn
text:
—Ah!?
S-Sorry, I didn't mean to just grab your hand...

A thick, broad hand clutches [Player]'s hand.
A grip that is hesitant and somewhat lonely, different from before.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
W-What do you mean 'sure'!?
You, you should value 'this kind of thing' a lot more!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Wait, that's not the point!
There's supposed to be something like an 'atmosphere'!
T-That's not the kind of vibe we were having!

options.text: What are you so worried about?

name: Jinn
text:
...Maybe it's an occupational hazard. I'm just so worried about you.
Whether you'll be able to earn a good 'future', or whether you'll be able to fulfill a good wish.

Eyes as hot as desert sands baked by the sun
gazed at the joined hands, as if they were something precious.

A side of Jinn never seen at Shinjuku Academy,
hesitating over every word, choosing them with extreme care.

name: Jinn
text:
Once this exchange is over, whether to stay at Shinjuku, transfer to Kiou,
or something else entirely— All of it is up to you to think about.

name: Jinn
text:
Judging by your work this time, Kiou is bound to prepare for your entry.
Maybe, they've already scouted you?

name: Jinn
text:
You have to think and choose your own path.
That... makes me anxious.

name: Jinn
text:
Who you want to be, what you want to do, the future you want to aim for...
Do you even have a clear idea of what you want to become?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yeah. Think it through carefully.
As a teacher, I can offer advice, and I can listen.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But— The decision is yours.
Only you can decide your own path for the future.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's obvious, but― I really felt it this time.
It's precisely because I'm a teacher, that there are things that my hands cannot reach.

options.text: I want to be with you, teach.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
W-With me...!?
What do you mean by that...!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Even after you graduate, I'd still be your teacher, but...
You don't mean it in that way, do you?

options.text: I want to be your master, teach.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Mast...!?
Hey [Player], y-you're joking, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I mean, I wouldn't exactly mind, but—
Wait!? What the hell am I saying!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
E-Eh, forget I said anything!
And stop trying to seduce your own teacher!

text:
Before [Player], many paths proceed to branch out before them.
Regardless of whether those paths are considered 'good' or 'evil'.

Between good and evil, humans beings waver while burdened
by their own contradictions. Yet, the mechanism of Garodemann
would simply purge those who come to a stop on the side of evil.

Whether [Player] will tread to good, or drift to evil—
That is a secret unbeknownst to anyone.

name: Jinn
text:
(Argh, damn it all!
'Regulations' this, 'Good and Evil' that, thinking about it is all just a waste of time!)

name: Jinn
text:
(If you're in trouble, I'll lend a hand! If you're worried, I'll listen!
That's all there is to it— And that's enough!)

name: Jinn
text:
Sorry, I'm getting all preachy. When you're a teacher,
you always end up like this when you're talking to a student.

name: Jinn
text:
Back to square one, now's your second wish. What do you want?
Today is special, I'll grant you anything.

options.text: I want to go somewhere where we can be alone~

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
J-Just the two of us... you say?
Well... It's true we've been in a crowd until just now...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Fine, I'll take you there...!
...Just don't do anything weird, okay!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
W-What are you planning to wish for!?
Don't get any crazy ideas!
It has to be within the bounds of common sense, alright!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...Y-You should save 'that kind of thing' for when you're old enough to lead a 'spirit' properly... (mumbling).

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I-It's nothing!
Dammit, I'm really pushing it, but I'll go along with whatever you've got!

options.text: What do you want to do, teach?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hm... Maybe because I'm always granting people's wishes, that honestly, I don't really have anything I want to do myself...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But, how... about the hot springs?
You've worked hard today, so let's go soak away the fatigue.

text:
With that, the two begin walking toward
their destination, standing side-by-side.

name: Jinn
text:
The best thing about a hot spring, is just how liberating it can be!
Nobody else's in sight, so we can relax all we want!

The next place the two visited was the hot spring stall.
Perhaps because of the late hour, it was in a private state.

note: they flexed on how many emotional states they can pull off with Option 3 :sobbing:

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Phew~ This slightly hot water really works...!
We've got 'steam baths' back home, but a foot bath is great too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
After walking that much, you're bound to be tired.
[Player], how about you? Not exhausted?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You don't notice the fatigue while you're having fun.
It's important to rest properly when you can.

options.text: (Watch as Jinn extends a hand from the tub)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Come on, [Player]!
The water's nice and warm~?
At Jinn's calling voice, [Player] enters the tub and sits next to him.

options.text: (Take Jinn's hand and jump into the tub)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Uwooooah!?
W-What was that for!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, that's dangerous, you idiot!
Good thing there were no other guests here...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Seriously, you're so reckless...!
Come here, don't leave my side, okay?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wait, wow, now you're too close!
What, a wish?
...Ah, I'm getting sleepy.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm so tired, I might not even notice what you'd be doing...
*snore*... *snore*... zzz... *snore*

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Oh, you done?
You, the three wishes didn't matter to you, you just did whatever you wanted to this lamp genie...!

name: Jinn
text:
Oh!? Whoa!?
...I-I... Sorry, I was just surprised.

His thick arms move clumsily, with a hesitation that
makes it seem like they'd have nowhere else to go.
And then, Jinn's arms timidly touch [Player].

Mixed with the 'sulfur' of the spring is a smoky scent.
As [Player] takes a breath to investigate the unfamiliar smell, Jinn panics.

name: Jinn
text:
Don't sniff me so much...!
I was born from fire, so of course I'd smell like smoke.

name: Jinn
text:
If you thought I smelled bad...
I'd never be able to recover...!

options.text: I think it's a good smell...
So this is your scent, Jinn-sensei?
(Intentionally bury your face in his skin and breathe deeply)

name: Jinn
text:
Hey, stop it, that's embarrassing!
S-So... Please, don't tease me so much...

options.text: (Get carried away and tease him more)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Gyaaah! Stop it, stop it!
Don't sniff me!
Don't hold on to me—!!
As [Player] buries their face into his hairy chest and sweat-dripping neck, they can smell the scent of damp desert sand.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I get it, I get it, you don't think I smell bad!
So let go of me!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Dammit! You think you can get all cocky...
Fine, if that's how it's gonna be, I've got a plan of my own...!

—With a 'thud', [Player] was wrapped in Jinn's weight.
With an irresistible but gentle force, they are pushed down by his powerful arms.
As Jinn hovers over [Player] on the cold stone flooring of the bathhouse, he flashes them a daring smirk.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're the one who smashed the teacher-student wall.
So, I'll give you the 'service' you've been asking for...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Gyaaah! Stop it, stop it!
Don't sniff me!
Don't hold on to me—!!
As [Player] buries their face into his hairy chest and sweat-dripping neck, they can smell the scent of damp desert sand.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I get it, I get it, you don't think I smell bad!
So let go of me!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Dammit! You think you can get all cocky...
Fine, if that's how it's gonna be, I've got a plan of my own...!

—With a 'thud', [Player] was wrapped in Jinn's weight.
With an irresistible but gentle force, they are pushed down by his powerful arms.
As Jinn hovers over [Player] on the cold stone flooring of the bathhouse, he flashes them a daring smirk.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're the one who smashed the teacher-student wall.
So, I'll give you the 'service' you've been asking for...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, no, sorry...
I didn't mean to...
Jinn looks surprised by [Player]'s sudden obedience, as if he had been expecting a fight.
In the slightly awkward atmosphere, Jinn flashes a smile.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
When you tease me like that, I end up taking it all to heart.
Maybe― it's because I can feel something something really big inside you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Not that it's an apology, but since we're here to relax...
Should I help you relax even more?
As he speaks, Jinn's hot arms press [Player] down onto the flat floor.

name: Jinn
text:
Back 'home', we get massaged in places like this.
And of course, I know the techniques.

name: Jinn
text:
Gwahaha! Prepare to experience
a real, authentic massage...!

options.text: Eh... can bones even move like that!?
I-Is this really a massa— Gyah!

name: Jinn
text:
([Player], your joints are still plenty flexible.
Even when you're growing towards an adult,
you still carry the traces of your youth.)

name: Jinn
text:
(No matter how mischievous you can be, or what kind of person you will be...
You're still just a kid yourself. There's no telling which way you'll fall towards.)

name: Jinn
text:
(The shadow of Shaitan, the presence of an Evil God, the premonition of a master.
Despite all that, you're still my student first and foremost.)

name: Jinn
text:
(And, even a kid labeled 'bad' can become a 'good' one.
In that case, my job's already decided—)

name: Jinn
text:
Alright! A present for the kid who worked hard!
Receive this devotion to your weary muscles and joints~!!

options.text: I'd like you to do other places too.
Now it's my turn to massage you. (rubbing hands)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Seriously, you never learn, do you?
Where do you get all that energy from!?

text:
Shinjuku Academy, Dorm Supervisor's Room.
The two were in the room where Jinn lived his daily life.

After the hot spring and massage, they had returned home
from the festival grounds in search of a place to relax.

Changing into loungewear, they gave themselves
away to a pleasant sense of fatigue.

name: Jinn
text:
Honestly, usually you're so loud about not wanting to be
treated like a kid, and yet here you are, completely defenseless...

name: Jinn
text:
But, you look like you're your age when you're dozing off like this.
No matter the era, young people just keep growing up...

name: Jinn
text:
Hushing around, playing, fighting... You're bound to be tired.
At your age, just playing and studying should be enough.

Whispering so as not to break [Player]'s slumber,
Jinn thinks to himself— What can he do for these kids?

Continue to be a teacher as he already is— Would that be enough?
Aren't there feelings that he should remember about?

name: Jinn
text:
(Come to think of it... Suidocho has those night classes.
There should be a course where working adults can learn...)

name: Jinn
text:
(I... think just having the mindset of a teacher might not be enough.
If I lose the feeling of being on the learning side, there are things I won't reach.)

Jinn hesitantly strokes [Player]'s hair,
who is drifting in and out of sleep.

Always at the center of trouble, a problem child, and a precious student.
[Player] would surely be able to survive anywhere.

Even if that's true, Jinn is still [Player]'s teacher—
And he wants to remain being so.

name: Jinn
text:
...Fufu.
Gwahahaha...

Even though they had finally passed their teacher's exams,
it seemed that their studies were far from over.
For some reason, that thought made Jinn breaks into a smile.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Cu...!? Gh... *cough* *cough*!
How can you always say things like that...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Gwahahaha! Too bad!
Did you think I wouldn't see that sleepy hand coming from a mile away?

name: Jinn
text:
...I just thought I should work hard so you can
always be my student, and I can always be your teacher.

Cupping [Player]'s cheeks in both hands,
Jinn speaks with a quiet, sweet tone.

name: Jinn
text:
This Christmas night's almost over.
Before it does... Do tell me your last wish.

note:
woooooooooo nesting choices!!!!!!
in case it wasn't obvious, those options are links
